text: rush hour here can be nuts too! i've started flexing hours at work so i dodge that whole mess - life's too short for human Tetris every morning. anyone else trying alternate schedules?

real talk felt grown up when clients trusted me alone on big projects at work made those late-night study sessions seem worth it suddenly all the critiques during uni were just prep for real deal decision-making
this whole 'adult manual' thing? total myth imo 🙄 everyone's improv makes jazz look planned
every financial advisor’s secretly guessing too 😉
work creeping into every corner? probably inevitable with tech nowadays but good time management can draw some lines – solid boundaries are key even if they're tough to maintain sometimes
even design critiques can get pretty stereotype-heavy
